duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead IT Process, Application or Asset Class assessment function within IT Risk.
Review and challenge all BLM self-assessments.
Maintain the IT Process, Risk, and Control inventory through review and implementation of change requests.
Lead annual review of all mapped information (authoritative sources, metrics, governed documents).
Act as a subject matter expert for all risk assessment and PRC topics, methods, and practices.
Complete and maintain ITRM assessment methodologies.
Build and maintain relationships with downstream users of risk ratings.
Identify emerging technology risks and lead the dialog among stakeholders to ensure that these risks are considered for entry into the IT PRC.
Perform validation and testing of open issues before closure.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in relevant field of study preferred (Master's preferred)
Industry designation preferred (e.g., CISA, CISSP, CRISC)
